mapper.sql: EQUIPMENTID, MACADDRESS, EQUIPMENTMODEL, EQUIPMENTTIME, IP, CPU, RAM, HARDDRIVER, HARDDRIVERMODEL, STORAGE, NETWORKCARD, MOTHERBOARD, OSNAME, OSTYPE, OSVERSION, OSID, USERID, ISNOTICE, GRAPHICCARD, AUDIOCARD, TIMEREMARKS
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'false' as QUERYID,
from tbl_currentequipment
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_currentequipment (EQUIPMENTID, MACADDRESS, EQUIPMENTMODEL, EQUIPMENTTIME, IP, CPU, RAM, HARDDRIVER, HARDDRIVERMODEL, STORAGE, NETWORKCARD, MOTHERBOARD, OSNAME, OSTYPE, OSVERSION, OSID, USERID, ISNOTICE, GRAPHICCARD, AUDIOCARD, TIMEREMARKS ) values (#{EQUIPMENTID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MACADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EQUIPMENTMODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{EQUIPMENTTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{CPU,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{RAM,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HARDDRIVER,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HARDDRIVERMODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{STORAGE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{NETWORKCARD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{MOTHERBOARD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSNAME,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSTYPE,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSVERSION,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{OSID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ISNOTICE,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{GRAPHICCARD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{AUDIOCARD,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{TIMEREMARKS,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

update tbl_currentequipment
MACADDRESS = #{MACADDRESS,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENTMODEL = #{EQUIPMENTMODEL,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EQUIPMENTTIME = #{EQUIPMENTTIME,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IP = #{IP,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
